0.1.name: wordpress/wp-w3-validation
0.1.description: Places an image on a page or post showing its html and/or css validity (only visible to the person editing the entry - just like the “Edit this entry” link). To use just add <?php if(function_exists('wp_w3_validation')) {wp_w3_validation();} ?> to your template php file, preferably right next to the function call <?php edit_post_link(’Edit this entry.’ ” ‘ ‘); ?>
